title: Particle System
description: In this video, I demonstrate higher order array functions in the context of my simple particle system coding challenge.

timestamps.title: fill() and map() - Initialize the particles array
filter() - Filter out particles which are finished
reduce() - Compute the centroid of particles
Compute the centroid in one line (using p5.Vector)
sort() - Layering of particles depending on color
